amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit Overseas Contingency Operation funds found in title IX from being used for anything other than a Contingency Operation as defined by United States Code.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 33 printed in House Report 114-623 to prohibit Overseas Contingency Operation funds found in Title IX from being used for anything other than a Contingency Operation as defined by United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 306 (Roll no. 323).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A032) Failed by recorded vote: 112 - 306 (Roll no. 323).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A032) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
